direction.raw_text: . DAY Mars Recovery is speeding ever closer to Mars, which now looms large, a dusty red mysterious sphere.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . LOWER HAB. DAY McConnell and crew are eating dinner while they watch a taped message from MMCR.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As Ray Beck addresses them. Other NASA STAFFERS, twenty or more, have crowded in behind him, and we sense their great hopefulness and high spirits; the whole team's triumph is tantalizingly close now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Beck takes a breath, smiles.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: We're going to continue analyzing this data and try to determine what the problem is with those images. Frankly, we're just as stumped as you guys, but we'll keep on it. (glancing around) We agree that the evidence of the graves is inconclusive and that a ground search is advisable. Be aware there are little sand storms kicking up near Mars One Base, but the big one you spotted is turning south. It shouldn't be a factor.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: We're all pretty excited here and we're sure you must be feeling the same. Enjoy your meal and get a good night's sleep. We anticipate that tomorrow morning you will be Go for Mars Orbital Insertion.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: . LOWER HAB. DAY WHOOPS OF JOY from McConnell's crew. Woody and Terri high five each other.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The monitor screen GOES BLACK.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: God bless you and goodnight. End of transmission.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: . LOWER HAB. NIGHT The lighting is subdued for a sleep period, but everyone's too restless. There's a low HUM of equipment.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . NIGHT Terri and Phil are playing computer Monopoly under a single light. Terri is using touch-screen technology to move her piece. She glances at Phil. He has spread some M&Ms out, letting them drift in mid-air as he performs his ritual weeding out of the red ones. She shakes her head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He touches the screen to roll the dice.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: What if you opened up your meal packs and found that, instead of putting in everything but red ones, they'd made a mistake and put in only red ones?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Hey, that's a funny notion. And what if in your meal packs, instead of brown rice, there were spring-loaded spikes that shot into your eyes?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (pause) How did you ever pass the psych evaluation?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: When you're schizophrenic, they take the higher score.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: . LOWER HAB. NIGHT McConnell, in his cubicle, looks away from the photo of Maggie. Haunted by memories. He rises, flips through the CDs in a storage case, pulls one out. He holds this carefully, hesitating, then feeds it into his computer. Immediately his screen saver vanishes and we see
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: An impromptu celebration, a bunch of friends gathered in a semi-darkened living room. The footage is HANDHELD, a bit jerky. People have paper plates of food, beers in hand, everyone is a little tipsy. Debra is there, Terri, Phil, Cote, Kirov, others. They're watching a STILL PHOTO SEQUENCE, shown on a large screen TV, with commentary by Luke and Woody.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is of a small boy (YOUNG MCCONNELL) in his pajamas, kneeling in front of a Christmas tree. He's grinning ecstatically as he holds up a brand new model rocket.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Jim's first ship was seriously underpowered...
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: at this. Some AD LIB CRACKS about the painfully bad haircut and the pajamas.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is of a gawky-looking teenage girl (YOUNG MAGGIE), standing on a porch at night, posing a bit self-consciously by a telescope on its tripod.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: More LAUGHTER, plus some digs about the nerdy eyeglasses and braces. VIDEOCAMERA swings around the room, REVEALING the adult JIM and MAGGIE. They sit side by side on the hearth, leaning into each other, looking very happy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: More LAUGHTER. Everyone's having a great time. The VIDEOCAMERA swings back towards the TV screen as
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Maggie was always starstruck...
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I'll get you guys for this.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Jim and Maggie, young adults, standing on the wing of a fighter jet. Both in Air Force flight suits, helmets in hand. Suntanned, cocky, flashing radiant smiles.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: When they met at the Air Force Academy, it was "love at first flight."
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: and LAUGHTER from the offscreen watchers.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: After that, NASA training was tough. All Jim could think about was exploring a heavenly body. More ribald LAUGHTER, as
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Maggie and Jim, tethered together, floating weightlessly in space suits.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: But Maggie, as you can see, kept him on a short leash. Until...
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Shows McConnell, in a dress uniform, leaning in to kiss Maggie, who wears a white bridal gown.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Mission accomplished!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: As he smiles at this, hearing the renewed LAUGHTER and CHEERS, the AD-LIBBED DIGS from the video. He becomes aware he's not alone. He looks up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stands in the doorway of his cubicle. Their eyes meet. They both smile, turning back to the video. Remembering.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Luke and Woody have stepped forward, INTO SHOT, standing at the sides of the TV, where the last photo lingers. Luke waves his hands, hushing everybody.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Both men raise champagne flutes.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Today we celebrate a new chapter in their story. And guys, it's a pretty historic one.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Let's hear it for the newly-announced Captain and Co-Captain of Mars One. To Jim and Maggie!

direction.raw_text: . DAY Too late! IN SLOW MOTION, we see a terrifyingly violent chain reaction. The fuel tanks themselves explode, one after another. The supporting metal struts are vaporized. The solar panels are snapped off. Two of the huge engine bells are smashed sideways, out of alignment, while the third, trailing pieces of the cowling, goes hurtling off, PAST CAMERA, like a flaming cannon ball. The entire aft section of the ship, including much of the lower Hab, instantly becomes a shredded, charred tangle of metal, and even worse, the explosion causes what's left of the ship -- mainly the EVA chamber and cockpit -- to tumble end over end, cartwheeling down towards Mars.
